instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Override the default shadcn/ui colors in `index.css` with the palette provided above. This is CRITICAL for the 'Clinical Dark Mode' look.
2. FONT SETUP: Import 'Manrope', 'Inter', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in `index.css`.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the dashboard. Do not create equal-sized cards. Use col-span-2 or row-span-2 for emphasis.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove default heavy borders. Use 'bg-white/5' for subtle backgrounds instead of solid colors.
5. BILLING: For the billing page, prioritize speed. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all pricing and quantity inputs. Ensure high contrast for totals.
6. ALERTS: Use the 'destructive' color for expiry alerts but keep it subtle (e.g., border-l-4 border-destructive bg-destructive/10).
7. MOBILE: Ensure the sidebar collapses into a Sheet (Shadcn) on mobile. The billing table must be scrollable horizontally on small screens.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) as per the rules.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
